actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to accept gifts, devises, and bequests for certain purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to accept gifts, devises, and bequests for purposes of enhancing the ability of the Department to provide quality and timely assistance to veterans eligible for benefits from the Department.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Department of Veterans Affairs to accept gifts, devises, and bequests for certain purposes.
